ResourceFeature.Name: Wand of Magic Detection
ResourceFeature.Text: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the detect magic spell from it. The wand regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

BonusSpellFeature.Text: While holding it, you can expend 1 charge as an action to cast the detect magic spell from it.
